channel.title: How do I make client playable?
channel.description:
hello people, I am having a little problem with my client. I made a webclient using rs-ps.org and everything is messed up in there. So I think that the client will fix the problems.
Now when people login from the client, it just says error connecting to server, please reload client and try again. I change the GUI.java thing to my serverip and then this happens. When i change it to 127.0.0.1, it works.
Can anybody tell me how to fix this? thanks
I am using PkPlanet, 317

item.title: How do I make client playable?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

hello people, I am having a little problem with my client. I made a webclient using rs-ps.org and everything is messed up in there. So I think that the client will fix the problems.

Now when people login from the client, it just says error connecting to server, please reload client and try again. I change the GUI.java thing to my serverip and then this happens. When i change it to 127.0.0.1, it works.

Can anybody tell me how to fix this? thanks

I am using PkPlanet, 317
